thread.title: Listen to Prince Royce & Shakira's New Bachata Track 'Deja Vu'
thread.title_full: Listen to Prince Royce & Shakira's New Bachata Track 'Deja Vu'

author: Griselda Flores
title: Listen to Prince Royce & Shakira's New Bachata Track 'Deja Vu'
text:
Scott Dudelson/Getty Images Prince Royce performs onstage during Calibash 2017 at Staples Center on Jan. 21, 2017 in Los Angeles. 
Bachata fans got a real treat from Prince Royce and Shakira , who just released their new single (and first-ever collaboration) "Deja Vu." The down-tempo bachata tune premieres just days before Royce's new album Five drops on Friday. 
And if you're wondering if there will be a music video to go along with the track, the answer is yes. Shak and Royce recently filmed the clip, directed by Jaume de Laiguana, in Barcelona. 
"Deja Vu" is Royce's fourth single from his anticipated fifth studio album, which also includes collaborations with Farruko , Zendaya and Chris Brown . 
Check out Billboard 's exclusive sneak peek of a few tracks on Five :
